titleStmt.title: Charles by the grace of God, King of Great Britaine ... forsomuch as we and the Estates of our Parliament presently conveened, remembring that at the first institution of the Colledge of Justice ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Second pt. of title from text.
"Given under our signet at Edinburgh the twentie eight day of June, and of our reigne the ninth year. 1633."
Reproduction of original in the Town House (Aberdeen, Scotland). Charter Room.
